description: Try our easy to follow Cherry Shortbread Cookies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Shortbread,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Baking,Quick & easy dessert,Cherry,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Cherry Shortbread Cookies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Blitz cherries in a food processor to roughly chop, then remove to a large bowl and set aside.
Pulse icing sugar mixture, flour and butter in the food processor until dough starts to form. Transfer dough to the bowl with cherries and use clean hands to gently mix cherries into the dough.

Lightly dust a work surface with extra flour. Divide dough into halves and roll each half into a log approximately 5cm diameter and 20cm long. Place logs on a tray and freeze for 20 minutes or until solid.
Preheat oven to 160Â°C. Line two baking trays with baking paper. Remove shortbread logs from freezer, cut into 1/2 cm slices and place on prepared trays at least 4cm apart.
Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes or until just golden on the edges. Remove from oven and allow to cool completely on trays. Store in an airtight container.
